meanings.definition: The first half of a line of verse.
meanings.sent1: In the poem, the hemistich described the beginning of each line.
meanings.sent2: The poet carefully crafted each hemistich to convey a specific meaning.
meanings.sent3: The hemistich decided to take a break and let the second half of the line do the work.
meanings.sent4: Her words in the hemistich danced like butterflies in the meadow of the verse.
meanings.sent5: The hemistich stood out like a bright star in the night sky of the poem.

meanings.sent1: Each hemistich in the poem had its own unique rhythm.
meanings.sent2: The students analyzed the structure of each hemistich to understand the poem better.
meanings.sent3: The hemistich whispered a secret to the other half-line in the verse.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were divided between the two hemistichs of the poetic line.
meanings.sent5: The hemistich painted a vivid picture in the reader's mind, like a brushstroke on a canvas.
